title: Preparation H Products for Hemorrhoids
author: Ami Ishver, PharmD

sections.heading: What do Preparation H products treat?
content: Preparation H products are used to treat symptoms of hemorrhoids , which can include itching, burning, discomfort, irritation, swelling, and painful bowel movements .
The products come in different forms (wipes, creams, ointments, gels, sprays, and suppositories) and are safe for adults and children as young as 12 years old .
Preparation H products use different ingredients to target specific symptoms.

sections.heading: What are the most common side effects of Preparation H products?
content: Most people don't have serious side effects. Stop using the medicine if you develop a rash or hives. Get medical help right away if you have signs of a serious allergic reaction, such as trouble breathing or swelling of the face, lips, or throat.

sections.heading: What should I know before using Preparation H products?
content: Stop using Preparation H products and call your health care provider if you have butt bleeding, your condition worsens or does not improve within seven days of using Preparation H, or if you have redness, irritation, swelling, pain, or other symptoms that are new or get worse. If you are using a Preparation H product that has an applicator and using the applicator causes more pain, stop using Preparation H and call your health care provider.
If you are using a Preparation H product that contains the ingredient phenylephrine, talk to your health care provider if you have any of the following before using the product.
When using a Preparation H cream, ointment, gel, spray, or suppository, clean the affected area with a cleansing wipe before using the medicine, when practical.

There may be side effects, additional warnings, and interactions with other medicines that are not listed here. These may vary depending on the combination of ingredients in the specific Preparation H product you are using. Always check the label before taking any over-the-counter medicine. Do not use more than the recommended dose. Talk to your doctor or pharmacist about your health conditions and other medicines to help determine which products are safe for you.

sections.heading: Which Preparation H product is right for my symptoms?
content: These products use phenylephrine (a vasoconstrictor) to shrink swollen tissue, helping with pain and discomfort.
These products contain an anesthetic (lidocaine or pramoxine) to numb the area, giving strong relief from pain and itching, plus other ingredients for swelling and protection.
This product contains hydrocortisone (a topical corticosteroid) to treat severe itching and inflammation.
bullets: Contains pramoxine (anesthetic), phenylephrine (vasoconstrictor), petrolatum, glycerin (protectants), and aloe
